mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_blog (user_id, title, description, content, created, status) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{title}, #{description}, #{content}, #{created}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE b_blog SET id = #{id}, user_id = #{user_id}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, content = #{content}, created = #{created}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM b_blog WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
